tips: You can delete nodes with the Backspace key.
You can collapse and expand certain nodes by double clicking on their headers.
A node can only have one input.
For each of your nodes, keep in mind that GPT models have a limited number of tokens to store the conversation, inputs that are too large may result in errors.
The software is still in its early stages, there may be bugs.
Your flow is available in JSON format in the sidebar indicated by the black mark on the right side of your screen, you can save and upload it from there.
Data is only sent to the APIs with which you interact (currently only OpenAI). The rest happens locally on your machine.
We do not store/use any of your data.
